summary: Torsten Nils Wiesel  is a Swedish neuroscientist.
full_text: Torsten Nils Wiesel  is a Swedish neurophysiologist. Together with David H. Hubel, he received the 1981 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine, for their discoveries concerning information processing in the visual system; the prize was shared with Roger W. Sperry for his independent research on the cerebral hemispheres.
title: Torsten Wiesel
